credentials.title: Authentication mechanism
credentials.description: Choose how to authenticate to Trello

key.title: API key
key.description: Trello API key. See the docs for instructions on how to generate it: https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/authorization/#using-basic-oauth

token.title: API token
token.description: Trello API token. See the docs for instructions on how to generate it: https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/authorization/#using-basic-oauth

boards.title: Board IDs
boards.description: The IDs of the boards to fetch. If not provided, all boards will be fetched.

cutoff_days.title: Cutoff Days
cutoff_days.description: Only fetch data updated after cutoff.

page_size.title: Page Size
page_size.description: The number of records to request from the API per call.

api_timeout.title: API Timeout
api_timeout.description: Timeout (in milliseconds) to use when making requests to the Trello API. 0 means no timeout.

max_retries.title: Max Number of Retries
max_retries.description: The max number of retries before giving up on retrying requests to the Trello API.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The date from which to start syncing data.

end_date.title: End Date
end_date.description: The date at which to stop syncing data.
